titles.modules.login-warning.content-1: If you do not log in, your data will be lost once you close the application.
titles.modules.login-warning.content-2: By logging in with your Ikosten account, we will save your data for 60 days so you can view and download your results.

titles.modules.process.help.complement: You can also skip reviewing your receipts
titles.modules.process.help.list-1: 1. Compare the seller's name with the statement line
titles.modules.process.help.list-2: 2. Check that the receipt date matches the statement date
titles.modules.process.help.list-3: 3. If you have multiple receipts from the same seller (Example: Uber) on the same date, verify that the payment amount is the same as on the statement
titles.modules.process.help.list-4: 4. When you find the problem, edit the receipt so that it can match the statement
titles.modules.process.help.list-5: 5. We give you some clues in red so you can identify the problem faster
